pullRequest.body:
This PR shows that `‚Äñsqrt a‚Äñ = sqrt ‚Äña‚Äñ` and `‚Äña ^ r‚Äñ = ‚Äña‚Äñ ^ r` when `a` is an element of an algebra that admits an isometric continuous functional calculus.

We also rename the file `Analysis.SpecialFunctions.ContinuousFunctionalCalculus.Rpow` to `Analysis.SpecialFunctions.ContinuousFunctionalCalculus.Rpow.Basic`, in order to put the new results in a new file with heavier imports. I think the new folder makes sense, especially since we'll need to do something like that anyway soon for the operator monotonicity and convexity/concavity results that depend on integral representations.

---

- [ ] depends on: #20882

- ...

-->

|Files|Import difference|

| `Mathlib.Analysis.SpecialFunctions.ContinuousFunctionalCalculus.Rpow.Basic`|1862|

</details>

---

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ nnnorm_nnrpow`

`+ norm_sqrt`
<details>

```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
```

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

---

<details><summary>No changes to technical debt.</summary>

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>

* ~~leanprover-community/mathlib4#20882~~

:v: dupuisf can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).
bors r+

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/12900116748/job/35970013103)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/12900116748/job/35970013274)

All the the suggestions below are of the form:

1. make `r` implicit
2. autoparam for `0 ‚â§ a`
3. :golfing:

If you agree with them all:

bors d+

As for file placement, I think our approach should be:

1. For material about generic continuous functional calculus material that *does not* import `Analysis.CStarAlgebra.ContinuousFunctionalCalculus.Basic`, we should place that in `Analysis.SpecialFunctions.ContinuousFunctionalCalculus`.
2. For material (even about the same functions), that *does* import the `Basic` file, this should go in the existing folder: `Analysis.CStarAlgebra.SpecialFunctions`.

All the the suggestions below are of the form:

1. make `r` implicit
2. autoparam for `0 ‚â§ a`
3. :golfing:

If you agree with them all:

bors d+
I'm open to putting this lemma and the next somewhere else, I couldn't really think of a better place. Also, I don't think the extra import here is a big deal, but I could be convinced otherwise.
I've generalized this in #20882
After the generalization in #20882, I suspect that this can be generalized to `NonUnitalIsometricContinuousFunctionalCalculus`.
Indeed it can be generalized. I've renamed the new file from `CStar.lean` to `Isometric.lean`.

```suggestion
lemma nnnorm_nnrpow (a : A) {r : ‚Ñù‚â•0} (hr : 0 < r) (ha : 0 ‚â§ a := by cfc_tac) :
    ‚Äña ^ r‚Äñ‚Çä = ‚Äña‚Äñ‚Çä ^ (r : ‚Ñù) :=
  NNReal.monotone_nnrpow_const r |>.monotoneOn _ |>.nnnorm_cfc‚Çô _ _
```

```suggestion
lemma norm_nnrpow (a : A) {r : ‚Ñù‚â•0} (hr : 0 < r) (ha : 0 ‚â§ a := by cfc_tac) :
    ‚Äña ^ r‚Äñ = ‚Äña‚Äñ ^ (r : ‚Ñù) :=
  congr(NNReal.toReal $(nnnorm_nnrpow a hr ha))
```

```suggestion
lemma nnnorm_sqrt (a : A) (ha : 0 ‚â§ a := by cfc_tac) : ‚Äñsqrt a‚Äñ‚Çä = NNReal.sqrt ‚Äña‚Äñ‚Çä := by
  rw [sqrt_eq_nnrpow, NNReal.sqrt_eq_rpow]
  exact nnnorm_nnrpow a (by norm_num) ha
```

```suggestion
lemma norm_sqrt (a : A) (ha : 0 ‚â§ a := by cfc_tac) : ‚Äñsqrt a‚Äñ = Real.sqrt ‚Äña‚Äñ := by
  simpa using congr(NNReal.toReal $(nnnorm_sqrt a ha))
```

```suggestion
lemma nnnorm_rpow (a : A) {r : ‚Ñù} (hr : 0 < r) (ha : 0 ‚â§ a := by cfc_tac) :
    ‚Äña ^ r‚Äñ‚Çä = ‚Äña‚Äñ‚Çä ^ r := by
  lift r to ‚Ñù‚â•0 using hr.le
  rw [‚Üê nnrpow_eq_rpow, ‚Üê nnnorm_nnrpow a]
  all_goals simpa
```

```suggestion
lemma norm_rpow (a : A) {r : ‚Ñù} (hr : 0 < r) (ha : 0 ‚â§ a := by cfc_tac) :
    ‚Äña ^ r‚Äñ = ‚Äña‚Äñ ^ r :=
  congr(NNReal.toReal $(nnnorm_rpow a hr ha))
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(ContinuousFunctionalCalculus): `‚Äñsqrt a‚Äñ = sqrt ‚Äña‚Äñ` and `‚Äña ^ r‚Äñ = ‚Äña‚Äñ^r` for an isometric CFC
